column5: well, tonight marks the battle of ontario, pretty much the stanley cup finals for us sens/leafs fans this season.  i'm looking forward to sitting down with a wobbly pop and swearing at the tv.  with any luck the sens will win for me, but with even better luck, the habs will lose for all of us!  the only thing as good as the sens winning is the habs losing!  time to get drunk!
They both suck this year. Go SENS.....
what no response to the outcome of the battle for Ontario?
....and the ultimate stroke of luck would be that he score clock falls on both teams while they are having a team photo taken so they can both start over. Now that would be a rebuilding year! Jim
sens fans are ticked because we lost again.  leafs fans are ticked because they won again. we all still hate the habs!
